amendment.description: To require a study on the use of the Space Radar for topographical mapping for scientific and civil purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2449 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2449 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12506) To require a study on the use of the Space Radar for topographical mapping for scientific and civil purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2449 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2449 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Thune.
